description:
BAND, the group communicating app, allows you to stay social, organized, and in touch with the groups that matter in your life.

Come together with a few friends or 1000 to make a Band for any of your communities, small or large! Use BAND for your family, your school newspaper, your running club, your fraternity and many others groups to share, communicate, and organize activities. 

BAND moves beyond chat and messaging functionality to keep your group in the loop with a full suite of free tools. It allows for traditional posting and chat, as well as group polling, community calendars, file sharing and photo albums. For greater convenience, users also have the ability to access their Bands on desktop. 

Download now to join the 35 million users already using BAND to keep up with friends, family and everyone in between, to share life as it happens. 



FEATURES:

YOUR BANDS – Greek organizations, study groups, sports teams, coworkers -- Join as many Bands as you want or create your own. Customize your Band cover photo and appearance to suit your style and invite your group to join you. 

BAND BOARD – The home-base for your Band allows members to keep up with group activity or post something of their own. Every member can share text, photos, videos, gifs, PDFs, location, stickers, Dropbox files, and vote on group polls. 

POLLS – Make your opinion heard through Band’s Polls feature. Band members can create polls to find out the group’s tee shirt sizes, best day to grab lunch, or which movie to go watch. Easily track the polls for every category, and see who has yet to participate. 

GROUP CALENDAR – Keep everyone on the same page with a private calendar for each Band. All members can add events with time and location before asking their Band members to RSVP. 

FILE SHARING – Band helps your group communicate across platforms. Upload files for the entire group to open either on their phone, or download to their desktop through Band’s web platform. 

GROUP CHAT – Stay in touch through a group chat with all the members of your Band…or decide to opt out. All members can share text, photos, voice messages and stickers. 

PHOTO ALBUMS – Share the important things with the important people in your life – upload up to 100 photos at a time to an existent group album, or start your own. Band can even help group members find themselves in your pictures with applied facial recognition.
trackCensoredName: BAND - Private Group Sharing, Messaging and Planning
trackName: BAND - Private Group Sharing, Messaging and Planning
releaseNotes:
* BAND is fully updated for larger screens and for iOS 8. 
  Easy on your eyes. Now BAND will look great on your iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus and even all iPad series as a bonus.

* Touch ID - rather simple and safe.
  Use your fingerprints to unlock BAND with Touch ID support. (iOS8 or up).

* BAND can now notify you of group members' birthdays.
Easily send birthday wishes to the people who you care about.
